summary: Completed testing of individual PDF download feature for AI Safety Vision app. Backend analysis endpoints working correctly (7/8 tests passed). PDF generation functionality implemented using jsPDF library with individual photo cards showing PDF download buttons and modal PDF download capability. Browser automation encountered technical issues preventing full UI testing.

minor_issues.issue: CORS headers not properly exposed in OPTIONS response
minor_issues.impact: May affect frontend CORS preflight requests

testing_limitations.issue: Browser automation encountered technical issues preventing full UI interaction testing
testing_limitations.impact: Could not verify PDF button clicks and toast notifications

passed_tests: Backend API connectivity and health checks
AI analysis endpoint with safety violations detection
Backend validation logic for multiple violations
Individual PDF download button implementation (code review)
Modal PDF download button implementation (code review)
action_item_for_main_agent: Manual testing recommended for PDF download functionality: 1) Upload test images, 2) Verify PDF download buttons appear on photo cards (hover for desktop, always visible for mobile), 3) Test modal PDF download button, 4) Verify batch export functionality, 5) Check that PDF files download with correct filenames including photo names
success_percentage: Backend: 87.5% (7/8 tests passed), Frontend: 60% (code structure verified, UI interaction testing incomplete)
